```{python}
#| label: Setup and helper functions
#| echo: false
import sys
import yaml
sys.path.append('/workspaces/planning-book')
sys.path.append('../../')
import utils

# Front matter YAML and check for errors
params = utils.get_params(frontmatter)

# Video links
with open('../../_hymns.yml', 'r') as vf:
    videos = yaml.safe_load(vf)
```

#### **Themes**

THEMES

:::  {.red}
#### **Entrance Antiphon**
:::

> All the earth shall bow down before you, O God,  
> and shall sing to you,  
> shall sing to your name, O Most High!

:::  {.red}
#### **Communion Antiphon**
:::

> You have prepared a table before me,  
> and how precious is the chalice that quenches my thirst.  
>  
> [Or:]{.red}  
>  
> We have come to know and to believe  
> in the love that God has for us.
